name: Winter Rituals
description:
It's late. If you want to buy some groceries, you really should go now before the store closes. It's only a 20 minute walk to go to town. But don't wander too much, you wouldn't want to get caught in a snowstorm.

Made with Bitsy.

This project was originally a 3D walking-simulator with a strong emphasis on audio. Unfortunately, after months of development and struggling, I just realized that 3D modelling wasn't my thing. So I decided to move on, and make this short story into a bitsy game. It was never supposed to be ambitious in the first place anyway.
